salesLetter.headline: God Has Already Given You Something Extraordinary
paragraphs: You have the mind of Christ. Right now. Not someday when you're more spiritual, but today.

Yet most believers haven't discovered how to access this incredible gift. Graham Cooke has spent decades learning how Heaven thinks about life, problems, and possibilities - and in this 18-session series, he shares everything.
The invitation before you: Step into the brilliant thinking that's already yours. Learn to see every situation the way God sees it - full of possibility, promise, and provision.

items.question: How do I access the series after purchase?
items.answer: You'll receive immediate access to all 18 sessions through our streaming platform. Simply log in and start watching on any device with internet connection.

items.question: Is this different from BrilliantPlus membership?
items.answer: Yes! This Elevate package gives you lifetime streaming access to this specific series for a one-time payment of $97, while BrilliantPlus is a monthly membership with access to our entire library.

items.question: Can I download the videos?
items.answer: This is a streaming-only product. You'll need an internet connection to watch, but you can stream as many times as you want, forever.

items.question: Can I share this with my small group?
items.answer: This purchase is for individual use. For group licenses, please contact our team for special pricing.

items.question: What if I want more after this series?
items.answer: This series is a perfect introduction to Graham's teaching. Many people continue with Movement membership ($47/month) or explore BSOL for comprehensive Kingdom leadership training.

items.question: How long do I have access?
items.answer: Forever! Once you purchase, you have lifetime access to stream all 18 sessions whenever you want.

items.question: Is there a money-back guarantee?
items.answer: Yes! Watch the first session. If it doesn't transform how you think about Kingdom living, we'll refund your investment.
